ProductInfo.Features:
At night, watch as it blends in perfectly with the dark and silently keep an eye on going on.
It's small enough to fit in the palm of your hand and can be placed in any corner in the room.
The Dark Wolf Mini Video Security Camera is here to keep your home and the great outdoors safer.
That's why this product comes rough, tough, and ready to serve in its full metal shell.
Whether you're in a civil war zone or just feeling a little insecure at home/office.
ProductInfo.Name: Security Powerful and Durable Dark Wolf - Mini Video Security Camera (Nightvision, Weatherproof, PAL) Tracking Tracing Tail
